creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: predominately black dress with multicolored geometric embroidery around the shoulders and chest; neck opening is circular with vertical slit down the front; geometric embroidery include designs such as zigzags, diamonds, and flower motifs; made of several panels; red stitching at hems; embroidered designs continue onto back; sleeves continue straight out from shoulders; small pocket outlined in red stitching at proper left hip
title: Dress
